text: This is an attack on the very soul of Maharashtra, which has always been a bastion of law and order and a testament to democratic values.
The opposition is trying to create a narrative of victimhood, but their own actions demonstrate a disregard for the rule of law and democratic norms.
The opposition's desperation has led them to invent a sophisticated, imaginary conspiracy theory to explain their own electoral failures.
This is a desperate attempt by a failing dynasty to cling to power by subverting the will of the people of Maharashtra.
The opposition's focus on such a specific, unverified technical detail suggests a lack of a broader, positive vision for Maharashtra.
The opposition is trying to create a 'bogeyman' of electoral fraud to mask its own inability to connect with the aspirations of the people of Maharashtra.
